definition: bad/spoiled/broken/to break down/(suffix) to the utmost

sentences.english: To show the wangs mobilization, jade was XiaoRong with a slingshot, said he was like a bad guy.
sentences.chinese: 到王家动员秀玉时，却被晓荣用弹弓打，说他像坏人。

sentences.english: Automatic search for opponent would rule-out players from your blacklist.
sentences.chinese: 自动找对手会排除与坏人棋友的配对。

sentences.english: But resistance to Japan is not finished and done for, nor are all Kuomintang members scoundrels.
sentences.chinese: 但是抗日仍然是有希望的，国民党里面也不都是坏人。

sentences.english: His five-year-old son thinks he’s a private eye who catches bad guys.
sentences.chinese: 他五岁的儿子以为他是个专门惩治坏人的私家侦探。

sentences.english: This hero is upholds justly, subdues the unprincipled person is his only objective.
sentences.chinese: 这位英雄是主持正义的，制伏坏人是他的惟一宗旨。

sentences.english: Bad people always come to a sticky end.
I didn't break it on purpose, Mum, it was an accident!
sentences.chinese: 他的死绝非仅仅偶然事故所致，而是坏人有意策划的。

sentences.english: But Lao She completely abandoned the miraculous denouement of Dickens"s novels in which virtue is rewarded and vice punished."
sentences.chinese: 狄更斯小说的结局总是好人得到好报坏人受到惩罚。

sentences.english: There are no villains here, only miscommunications and confusion.
sentences.chinese: 在这些问题上没有坏人，有的只是缺少交流与困惑。

sentences.english: We must not stand by when people damage state property.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须与坏人坏事作斗争，不能袖手旁观。

sentences.english: Some people become bad because they learn from the bad people in those programmes.
sentences.chinese: 有些人变成坏事，因为他们从这些方案的坏人学习。

sentences.english: Who do you think is the bad guy in the software industry?
sentences.chinese: 你认为谁是软件业的坏人？

sentences.english: It could be anyone from an animal to a bad person.
sentences.chinese: 这个坏家伙可能是任何模样，从动物到坏人。

sentences.english: The bad and the good are a perpetual conflict.
sentences.chinese: 好人和坏人是一对永远的矛盾体。

sentences.english: The Thick Face, Black Heart practitioner understands that hitting back does not necessarily make you a bad person.
sentences.chinese: 厚黑学实践者懂得，还击不会使你变成坏人。

sentences.english: On the way home, ping is a group of bad guy robbed, and is strong to pull out of the car.
sentences.chinese: 在回家的途中，萍被一群坏人抢劫，并被强拉下车。
